title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Comprehensive course covering machine learning algorithms, data preprocessing, and model deployment using Python and popular libraries.
whatYouLearn: Learn supervised and unsupervised learning techniques
Master data preprocessing and feature engineering
Implement machine learning models using scikit-learn

instructorDetails.name: Dr. Emma Rodriguez
instructorDetails.title: Data Science Expert
instructorDetails.bio: Dr. Rodriguez is a leading data scientist with extensive experience in machine learning research and industry applications.

reviews.review: Comprehensive course that truly demystifies machine learning concepts.
Well-structured course with practical examples and clear explanations.

title: Social Media Marketing Mastery

instructorDetails.bio: Lisa Chen is a renowned digital marketing expert with over 8 years of experience working with global brands.

reviews.review: Transformed my understanding of social media marketing completely.

title: UX/UI Design Fundamentals
